SEARCH
Package dev.karlkadak.backend.service

Class CityManager

java.lang.Object
dev.karlkadak.backend.service.CityManager
@Service public class CityManager extends Object
Used for managing the cities and their tracking in the database
Also logs the management actions using Logger

  • Constructor Details

    • CityManager

  • Method Details

    • enableImporting

      public City enableImporting(String name)
      Adds a City object with the given name to the database or enables tracking its weather data in case it already exists
      Parameters:
      name - name of the city to add / toggle
      Returns:
      generated / toggled City object

    • disableImporting

      public City disableImporting(long id)
      Disables the weather data tracking for City object with given ID
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the City object to disable
      Returns:
      toggled City object

    • retrieveCompleteCity

      City retrieveCompleteCity(String name)
      Retrieves a complete City object using the city name received using the OpenWeather API
      In case such city already exists in the database, returns that instance instead
      Needs to be package-private in order to test directly
      Parameters:
      name - city name to look up
      Returns:
      a City object linked to the name of the city input, if city is present in database returns that instance

    • nameFormattedCorrectly

      private boolean nameFormattedCorrectly(String name)
      Used for preliminary checking of a city name's validity
      Refuses malformed names
      Parameters:
      name - complete name of the city to check
      Returns:
      true for acceptable, false for malformed city name
